items.headline: Nvidia’s on-and-off China relationship appears to be on again
items.summary_en: The on-and-off saga involving Nvidia and China appears to be back on again, after a report that China’s government has given the go-ahead to big companies including Alibaba to buy the U.S. semiconductor maker’s chips.
